name: The Roll Troll (Jam Build)
description:
Welcome to The Roll Troll. The Roll Troll is a short bullet hell game (made in Scratch, exported in Turbowarp), inspired by Undertale and Enter the Gungeon. You must roll, and swap dice, to get actions and dodge bullets. 
Change Log: 7/16/2022: Finished alpha, released to public, added secret dialogue, added custom cursor, and fixed bugs. Added voice lines. Toggleable cursor. Space to toggle it.
7/17/2022: Added more dialogue, added skipping dialogue, balanced music volume changed the title music, added more art from our artist, (Read People Helping) fixed bugs, more bugs, and dang it more bugs, fixed the issue where audio would disalign and fix ordering.
People Helping: DJMACHUB (They have a YouTube under this name, and the talented artist who makes banners, made most of the art in this game and the art in the screenshots and another member helped with ideas and did the recording in the gif.) Mikeinthedoe did all the voice acting in this build. 

Font used: Nanum Pen Script from Google Fonts
